title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed APIs as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use any Ollama model as an LLM, chat, or embeddings backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, RAG, voice input).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Android client for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, pull, etc.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints; supports streaming chat, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA, summarization, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for Ollama: PDF chatbot, voice assistant, function-calling, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to chat with Ollama models in channels/DMs; supports streaming replies and context threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to call Ollama chat/generate/embed workflows in no-code automation scenarios.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI for Ollama with session memory, model switcher, and token-speed metrics.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight async Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST endpoints using reqwest and serde.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama using std.http; exposes chat, generate, and embeddings with allocator-based memory control.
